name: Ted Flemming
message: I have had the pleasure of working with Vishal for nearly 2 years. In that time he has proved to be a conscientious developer who is engaged in in our complex operations, always willing to go the extra mile to get results and resolve issues to complete satisfaction. His calm nature, with patience & professionalism makes working with Vishal very easy. Vishal has a great ability to manage relationships with both customers and his internal team to obtain the best from any topic. He has a good understanding of the ServiceNow environment, with a willingness to help educate others. I can’t honestly evaluate his technical work at a technical level, however I do know the output is always meeting our needs, works well with improvements implimented as proposed by Vishal to bring added value. I have no hesitation in recommending Vishal as he is a fine team member to have on board.
title: ITSM - Process Owner, Airbus

name: Priti Messoumian
message:
Vishal is a true asset to any team.
 - Team Player : check,
 - Innovative : check,
 - Dependable : check. Having Vishal on my team, made work so easy. We worked together on ServiceNow, and I never had to worry about any of his implementations he made to the platform. He can always be relied on to check all possible use case scenarios.
Brainstorming with Vishal is always a pleasure. He comes ready, having done the background work on the discussion topic. He listens carefully to everyone's ideas and concerns and can usually suggest multiple ways forward in the meeting itself. Sometimes he has even made the impossible possible.
Vishal always strives for perfection in his work and helps his team move forward. It's been a real pleasure working with him. I have no doubt that whatever he puts his mind to he will achieve!
title: Co-Process Owner/Project Manager/Business Analyst, Altran

name: Sandeep Sen
message:
As a developer Vishal has in depth knowledge of Service now, and being a very quick learner he always try to see current trends and improve his implementation.
I know for sure Vishal will go to places with his dedication and never die attitude.
title: Lead Engineer, Airbus India

name: Adarsh Sharma
message: Vishal is someone with an appetite for learning new things...He just can't stop and wait for things to move forward...He takes things froward, even if others are reluctant to do so...He's reliable, technically apt and is a good team player...a potent mix of someone who can be a good leader, which he'll be in the due course of time...
title: Principal Architect, DxSherpa Technologies Pvt. Ltd

name: Disha Das
message: You are a true quick learner, good teacher, ambitious, a chef and there is a long list. During our project days, I never seen you wasting time other than learning something new in Servicenow. You are always ready to take challenging works. You are a genuine asset for any organisation. I hope our paths cross again.
title: D.Technical Specialist, Hexaware Technologies

name: Monali Patil
message: Vishal,I truly appreciate your enthusiasm every day! Your work ethic is impeccable.Your ability to find humor even in stressful times is an inspiration! I admire your drive and commitment to goals and accomplishments. I’m so lucky to have you as a colleague.You have a talent for making everyone around you happier.You go above and beyond!
title: ServiceNow Developer, DxSherpa Technologies Pvt. Ltd.

name: Rajneesh Pandey
message:
Vishal possesses two of the most important qualities required of a developer: observation and a strong desire to learn new things. He does not do it as a hobby, but he strives for perfection.
He is always willing to accept a difficult task as a challenge, but most importantly, he completes it without fail, which makes him a dependable team member in any situation.
Needless to say he is an asset to any team and his dedication will surely take him to places professionally.
title: ServiceNow Developer, DxSherpa Technologies Pvt. Ltd.

name: Gaurav Shirsat
message: Vishal is a person with the Dynamic Technical Skill Set. He has always been a good mentor, quick learner. his RCA skills of Problem Solving and Handling the critical situation are the best qualities I have experienced.
title: ServiceNow Community MVP 2022, DxSherpa Technologies Pvt. Ltd.

name: Rakshitha Devaraju
message: Hey Vishal, Your an amazing developer on ServiceNow. It is really happy to know the growing curve of yours in the team. Indeed you will grow high in IT & in life too. I wish you all the best for upcoming challenges.
title: Software Engineer, Airbus Group of India Private Limited
